text: Stop is the second album released by the band Plain White T's. It was the first plain White T's album to be released on Fearless Records. The album was released August 20, 2002. ==Track listing== # "Stop" # "Please Don't Do This" # "What If?" # "Fireworks" # "Leavin'" # "Shine" # "Your Fault" # "Happy Someday" # "A Lonely September" # "Can't Turn Away" # "Penny (Perfect For You)" # "Radios In Heaven" Category:2002 albums Category:Plain White T's albums
title: Stop (Plain White T's album)
